string.text: There is an active quest preventing it!
This war hasn't gone on long enough to consider peace! It has only been {ELAPSED_DAYS} days out of a required {REQUIRED_DAYS} days.
Cannot declare war so soon after making peace! It has only been {ELAPSED_DAYS} days out of a required {REQUIRED_DAYS} days.
Cannot declare war on this kingdom.
Cannot make peace with this kingdom.
The messenger from {FACTION1_NAME} has arrived at {HERO_NAME} of {FACTION2_NAME}.
The messenger from {FACTION1_NAME} will arrive at {HERO_NAME} of {FACTION2_NAME} in {TRAVEL_TIME} days.
{KINGDOM_LEADER} of the {KINGDOM} is proposing peace with the {PLAYER_KINGDOM}.
They are willing to pay war reparations of {DENARS} denars.
As the capturer of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}, you have the right of first refusal. Would you like to claim this fief?
You cannot grant fiefs to your own clan.
You are not the leader of your kingdom.
You don't have any fiefs to grant.
Grant fiefs to clans in your kingdom
War exhaustion is too high to declare war. Current war exhaustion is {CURRENT_WAR_EXHAUSTION} and {LOW_WAR_EXHAUSTION_THRESHOLD} is the highest allowed.
You have been at war too recently to consider an alliance. It has only been {ELAPSED_DAYS} days out of a required {REQUIRED_DAYS} days.
Cannot already be in an alliance.
This faction is not interested in forming an alliance with you.
This alliance hasn't gone on long enough to consider breaking it! It has only been {ELAPSED_DAYS} days out of a required {REQUIRED_DAYS} days.
Exhausted from the war, the {KINGDOM} is proposing peace with the {PLAYER_KINGDOM}.
The minimum duration (in days) that a war can last before proposing peace. Default value is 10.
The minimum duration (in days) to declare war after making peace. Default value is 10.
Gives the player total control over their kingdom's war and peace declarations.
Allow Player To Claim Player-Taken Settlements
Gives the player the option to claim a settlement that they have taken rather than let it go to an election.
The minimum duration (in days) that an alliance can last. Default value is 10.
If disabled, this removes all costs for war and peace declaration actions. Default value is true.
If enabled, this will scale influence costs based on your kingdom size. Otherwise, flat influence costs are used. Default value is true.
Multiplier for the scaling influence costs. Default value is 5.
Influence cost for declaring war on another kingdom. Default value is 100.
Influence cost for making peace with another kingdom. Default value is 100.
Influence cost for sending a messenger to another leader. Default value is 10.
The amount of time (in days) a messenger takes to reach a kingdom's leader. Default value is 3.
If disabled, this disables the war exhaustion mechanic. Default value is enabled.
The amount of war exhaustion added per day a war is ongoing. Default value is 1.0.
The amount of war exhaustion added when a faction has a battle casualty. Default value is 0.01.
The amount of war exhaustion added when a faction loses a city. Default value is 10.0.
Enable Player War Exhaustion Debug Messages
Enables debug messages for war exhaustion added to the player kingdom. Default value is false.
The amount of war exhaustion that forces a faction to propose peace. Default value is 100.0.
The amount of war exhaustion added when a faction's village is raided. Default value is 3.0.
The amount of war exhaustion decay per day the factions are at peace. Default value is 1.0.
Scaling War Reparations Gold Cost Multiplier
Multiplier for the scaling of war reparations gold costs. Default value is 100.
If disabled, this disables the ability to form alliances for both player and AI factions. Default value is enabled.
